channel.title: Player command
channel.description: does anyone know how to add a ::players command with a menu and there ran from playersright 0 = 3 and donator like if im the owner i would do ::players and show [Game Staff]Frozen and stuff please can someone help me

item.title: Player command

item.description:
@kelly15 wrote:

I ment like if aplayer does ::players it opens up the menu and shows a mod and the example will be "[Game Staff]Example mod like that

item.title: Player command
item.dc:creator: @mich702703 mich702703
item.description:
@mich702703 wrote:

Ok try this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players") && (playerRights >= 3)) { playerMenu(); sM( "Players Online " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()); }

add this 2:

[code] public void playerMenu() {
clearQuestInterface();
for (int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
if (server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { {
sendQuest("@dre@Players", 8144); // Title
sendQuest(
"@whi@ Players Online: "
+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(),
8145);
sendQuest(
“@whi@” + server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName,
8147 + i);
}
}
}

    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
}[/code]

Read full topic
